99895.「やあやあ 旅のお方。\n それがしは トルギと申す。\n 馬車で 行商を営む者:
Hello there, fellow traveler. My name is Tolgi. I am a wagon peddler, that I am. My job is to transport goods from
Kamiharmui to various places with this wagon, that I do. I am going to Mountain Pass on Inamino Highway and
Ruined Village in Sunset Meadow, that I know.

99896.「これから イナミノ街道の 山間の関所と \n 落陽の草原の ガケっぷち村に行く:
I am going to Mountain Pass on Inamino
Highway and Ruined Village in Sunset
Meadow, that I know of.<bw_break>

99897.「やあやあ 旅のお方。\n それがしは トルギと申す。\n 馬車で 行商を営む者:
Hello there, fellow traveler. My name is Tolgi. I am a wagon peddler, that I am. My job is to transport goods from
Kamiharmui to various places with this wagon, that I do. I am going to Mountain Pass on the Inamino Highway,
that I will go to, if you would like to take me there.

99898.「これから イナミノ街道にある\n 山間の関所に 行くでござるが\n よければ:
We are going to Mountain Pass on the
Inamino Highway, that we can ride to
there, if you don't mind.<bw_break>

99899.<pipipi_low>「むむむ？ めんぼくない。\n 今 そこに向かうのは\n:
Mm-hmm? Menbo Kunai, it seems a little inconvenient for you to go there now, that it does. I will refund your fare,
that I hope you will come back again after some time.

99900.「ただし 送るだけで 迎えには行けぬでござる。\n それでもよければ\n どちら:
However, I can only drop you off and not pick you up, that I cannot. If you still wish, where would you like to
go, that you would?

99901.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「まいどあり！:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>There is a ''mairi''! That I am, that I
am. Then, I will go immediately, that
I will.

99902.「おお。お乗りにはなられぬか。\n では 乗りたくなったら\n また来てほしいで:
Oh. You don't ride, do you? Then, if
you feel like riding, that you should
come again.

99903.<pipipi_low>「おまちどおさま！ でござる。\n 山間の関所に 着いた:
Thank you for your patience! We have arrived at Mountain Pass, that we have. We have arrived at Mountain
Pass, that we have.

99904.<pipipi_low>「おまちどおさま！ でござる。\n ガケっぷち村に 着い:
Thank you for your patience! We have arrived at the Ruined Village, that we have. We have arrived at the Ruined
Village, that we have.

99905.「むむ。お金が足りないようでござるな。\n お金を持って また来てほしいでござる:
Hmmm. It seems that you are short of
money. I hope you will come back again
with more money, that I hope.

99906.「<%sL_TIMEI>まで\n 行くでござるな。\n 運賃２５ゴールド いただ:
You are going to <%sL_TIMEI>. I'll
charge you 25 gold for the ride, if
you don't mind.<yesno><break>

99907.「おお。それは残念でござるな。\n 機会があれば また来てほしいでござる。:
Oh. That is unfortunate. I hope you
will come again if you have a chance,
that I do.

117313.「ここから 東のイナミノ街道には\n 山間の関所という 集落があるでござる。\n:
There is a settlement called Mountain Pass on Inamino Highway east of here, that there is. From Kamiharmui North,
northwest of here, go to Sunset Meadow, and westward, there is a village called Ruined Village, that
there is. If you have never been there, it would be good to go there once, that it is.

76464.魔物を従えていなければ\nここより先へは 進めないようだ。:
It seems that one cannot go any
further than this point without having
monster in tow.

76465.魔物を従えていなければ\nここより先へは 進めないようだ。\n<br>\n仲間の:
It seems that we cannot proceed any further without a monster. The companion monster is dead, so let's
bring it back to life and come back again.

76466.魔物を従えていなければ\nここより先へは 進めないようだ。\n<br>\n仲間の:
It seems that we cannot proceed any further unless we have a ''monster'' with us. Since the companion's monster
is in a standby state, let's make it join and come back again.
